caption: Rooms are average, but not super deluxe ac as per mentioned in their advertising. Food quality was excellentüëç and on time. Food service is good.  Tour package planning is very poorüëéüëé, not all places are covered. You have to pay more money for each extra points to visit. Only half day tour is included in the package and sometimes due to traffic problems you miss your pre planned places to visit. Swimming pool is not so clear and closed for most of the time.  Located at the most suitable place near to market and bus stand

Room service is not good but breakfast to dinner is good. Canteen is not available so you will not get even tea at odd time and hot water available for 3 hrs only but location and menu of food and staff behavior is good. Overall Experience is good

They have to improve on their infrastructure... at the resort....We have stayed in resort for 3 days and there is no electricity most of the time and there is no adequate major taken for providing hot water...  Staff is really helpful in every thing....food was awesome....rooms are spacious....  Neeta Bharat Benz services are also good.  Overall I can give them 2 stars because lack of basic amenities.

We had recently visited this villa. We booked a super deluxe room for 2 here which was charged at ‚Çπ2500 per day without food. We didn't have an excellent experience here.  1. Firstly hot water time is 7 AM to 10 AM but it usually comes by 8 or later. Basin taps and jets are not in good condition.  2. No working AC. We had changed our room once from 104 to 208 but there too the AC was broken and we were unable to change temperature.  3. Rooms have 'seelan' as shown in pics and the beds are damp. You would feel very cold even with blankets on due to this dampness.  4. Room no 208 had a smelly bedsheet which they changed after a number of complaints.  5. There are power cuts as well. Sometimes for hours. No telecom was there in 208. When asked they gave a mobile number and asked to call that number if needed.  Overall the property is good but not well maintained. Don't go by the online pictures on MakeMyTrip and other websites. Reception staff will remind you of pending payment if any and if you complain of non working AC or dirty room they will just say 'kisi ko bhejta hu'.  Please avoid this resort.

For me it was a terrible experience the food here was worst I have ever tasted and also it caused to be ill for almost 2 weeks. I observed that there was no sanitation followed while cooking of food. I would suggest please don't consider this hotel as your option for staycation.

Rooms : Ok  No Brush, No Toiletries Item, No Slippers Provided  Food : Ok (Many items but repetitive Food for all 3 days)  Location : Good ( Close to Market)  Hot water must be available 24 hrs, specially during winter.  Swimming Pool not usable due to Monkey frequently Drinking and Swimming in Pool  Overall : Ok
Rooms conditions r very bad dirty Smell also no hot water. Food quality is ok no verity same food repeted if u r going to plan for neeta shanti villa plz avoid
Rooms are dirty, hot water is only in morning time. Pool is not clean, food is good. Location is good near market.
I strongly suggest please dont book this hotel. Worst place. Rooms are not good. Food is not good. Swimming pool is closed due to uncleaned water. Overall waste of money.
Nice & Pleasant stay in Neeta Ashanti Vila. Staff & Manager are very cooperative. Food are also good & rooms are clean.

The rooms are pretty decent and the place is also awesome. But I would highly recommend getting a clear note on the local tourism package as there will be a chase between the number of points to be covered vs time, so you wouldn't get much to enjoy the places. Better to be very clear that if it's a 4 hour tour then you don't care how much time you take on one spot the tour will end in 4 hours but you get to choose how much time you want to spend at one place
Its a great villa...They have their own restaurant and bus service too...so its great... located near the main market.

The mattresses on the beds were so wet & damp. The provided blankets were of cheapest quality & they were also wet & damp.The room overall upstairs & downstairs were damp & ill kept. The Aircon was not able to increase the temprature & so we were unable to use it to warm up the room. There were clumps of hair on the bed sheet in the upper room.we almost froze the whole night in the room. Next day when we asked for cancellation of our stay on the second day & refund of our money, but the management failed to refund us any money, giving us vague response. The food taste wise was ok but in  dinning room there was so much water leakage everywhere. The service was just so so. Overall it wasn't a good experience at all. The linen was bad as well.For the amount of money they were charging services provided were not comminsurate with the price.
Nice location.  Food is good. But want some improvement  in premise.

Worst hotel I have ever stayed. Very poor amenities and rooms were really bad. Food was ok but no variety considering the price they were taking. The room service was also bad and even the TV was also not working properly. Bathrooms were also not very clean and the timings for food and hot water were very inconvenient. Even pool wasn't clean and there was water logging. The cement in the wals were also falling off with some water leakags in them. Overall very poor hotel with the worst management I have seen. Better to book another hotel in the same price.
Service is very nice , food also excellent & hotel is clean & need , hotel is near by market .
Very bad experience ,friends don't go there ,worst place,  swimming water was very dirty , rooms was not cleaned, bad bugs in the room bed

My humble request to who so ever wants to book or even considering this hotel. Please dont üôèüèª Pathetic service‚Ä¶infact no service at all being in hotel industry. Cockroaches and grasshopper lying down and u have to have your food with it. Hot water only from 6.30-10.30am. No clean towels‚Ä¶no room service‚Ä¶no cleaning of rooms‚Ä¶rooms and hotel are in pathetic situation‚Ä¶beds are torn off‚Ä¶bedsheets have holes‚Ä¶blankets are dirty as hell‚Ä¶no water in flush‚Ä¶half of the time no water at all‚Ä¶we had booked 3 rooms thinking will have more bathrooms to get ready‚Ä¶but of no use as thr was no water‚Ä¶Mangesh from the borivali office is a liar‚Ä¶Neeta from the management had the audacity to tell us to leave first day itself when v faced so much issues after taking full payment‚Ä¶if u pay them in parts they will keep reminding of the balance amount till your last day‚Ä¶usually you pay at the time of checkout but u will be forced to pay them as they will keep reminding you about your balance amount.

Worst experience.  Visited this place on 3rd week of August 2022.  Bus service was good.  Rooms were pathetic. No maintenance at all. There was no water in flush tank. We had to call person from reception to open our room door as we couldn't open the room door from inside as room door had become hard.  Staff service was pathetic. Very rude.  Never ever go this hotel.
Best place to stay. Very nice staff and extremely well maintained hotel. Very close to main market.

Rooms were pathetic.....there was no ventilation in the room.... bathroom was also very dull and unhygienic... food was ok.....the only USP of the hotel is it is close to the market.... property seriously needs the renovation.
Very good villa for stay. Stayed in mahableshwar at this property and all services and rooms were good. Cost is at higher side.
Poor maintenance of rooms Linens were uncleaned ,  smelling bad... Water heater was not available in room . Payment is high but facilities are poor

Traveling date- 13/8/2022. Hotel-3rd class Service-3rd class We booked by Neeta Holidays for super deluxe rooms. But room are like 3rd grade government rooms. If u went here by mistakes,  keep argue and asked for upgrade good rooms. Dont go this hotel. Water leakage everywhere in rooms. No hot water, no water in flush tank. Worst experience ever. I given 1 star only for his food. Many option in breakfast, lunch and dinner. Food test are very good.

Rooms are unhygienic, no cleanliness, bedsheet stinking, no hot water, Returning bus booking was bad, instead of Ac bus it was a shuttle bus provided for returning journey by Neeta.... Food quality is ok, but rooms are very badly maintained....
Overall budget friendly place to stay, food was awesome.

Hopeless service! Pathetic service Rooms are bad Toilets are bad Ac not working Rooms not ventilated Pest problem Staff service is not good Games and DJ are not available Foods taste is satisfactory, menu choice is bad. Breakfast choice is bad. Sightseeing people are cooperative Contact kisan. Overall a very bad experience Please donot take this hotel at all Spend lil more go for nice one..
Budget friendly, perfect for family villas. Located at the Center of market hence You may not be able to see scenary from room .Food is good and has homemade taste.

Location excellent. Rooms basic and without any view. We stayed here for 2 nights and the first whole night there was no electricity and no staff to look into it. The whole night we had to sleep without even a fan inspite of paying for an ac room. Hot water is available only in the mornings. My child had to take a cold water bath after playing in the swimming pool in the evening. Tv set top box was also not working. Will not recommend

Rooms - Really comfortable rooms, we had a room with 2 beds which was enough and then hotel staff would come regularly to clean the rooms and replace it with cleaner towels Service - there is no room service there Location - location was pretty good as it is right by the main market in mahabhaleshwar  tHe food was really good but over the years the variety of food has been decreased, it might be because of inflation but nevertheless the quality of food is still very good and healthy. There's beautiful flowers and a pool too

Pro *Good food. *Children play area is well maintained.Little ones will have a wonderful time. *Arrangement for outdoor touring was planned well *Volvo Bus was pretty well maintained (Neeta travels) Cons *Swimming pool is not maintained well ..with flies across the pool ! *Rooms are not well ventilated ! Though if u r planning to stay out most of the time then it shouldn't matter much.  Overall a pretty decent experience.

The bathroom was unhygienic. The rooms are so small and old. The walls are having leakages. Just because you saw some swimming pool don't come here. It is better to stay somewhere there is no swimming pool rather than staying here. There is no hot water. Especially for hygiene level I would rate 1/5

Though rooms were spacious, room had Lizard on floor. No cupboard or cloth rake was provided. They had kept an old broken TV table cum showcase in Bathroom of both rooms and told us to keep cloths there. Lighting inside bathroom was also pathetic. Hot water was not available for whole stay. Had to request at least give a bucket of hot water for kids. TV was not working as usual. Nobody came despite request.  Would not recommend the hotel for family.

Literally WORST. They are just there to loot people. Even a Dharamshala is better than this. Pathetic room service. Have to call 10 times to get things done. Still you need Luck on your side. We get hot water only 1 hour in a day here that too we don't get sometimes. Arrogant management. Average food. Sight seeing people are also 3rd class. TV also doesn't work many times. No indoor games in playing condition or DJ as they Claim. (Check pictures) Swimming pool is also worst.  NEVER EVEN GO HERE FOR FREE. WASTE OF MONEY.
Service was worst... Swimming rides was working on time . Worst resort in mhableshwr.
This like a Lodge, Not a Resort, i booked for 3 nights, i stay only one Night, and shifted to MTDC , don't tried.
Hotal room is neat and clean staff  very helpful food is exilent superb experience
Shanti Villa Resort is Verry Good Service & Room is Clean Food is Good.
Good hospitality, co operative staff,clean room, highly recommend
Very Excellent place to stay at the location was good and staff was polite

Everything from beginning till the end of the trip was nothing but a huge disappointment. The hotel room, food, tour package, transportation everything was huge scam by the company. It is better to travel on your own and save thousands rather than trusting these people. Poor management and service provided. It's better to go tour on your own rather than trusting these people who charge twice. The let us down big time and rather than enjoying the view, we were constantly dealing with issues with the company with no resolution. Definitely not recommended to anywhere as there are much better options available nearby within the same price range.

My experience in the stay with family was as follows and I am mentioning some points for improvement as under:  Good points:  Staff Very accomodative and good Overall approach satisfactory  Improvement:  Food to be served properly not to restrict as it's a buffet. Staff to view the no of passengers and keep the daily usables like towels Slippers should be there in every room Maintenance activity needs to be done in overall resort Playground for kids need to be developed Dinner lunch and breakfast need to be kid friendly and less spicy  Overall a thumbs up to the staff and management a big 4 star for the resort
It's very good place for family and foods are awesome üëå ‚Ä¶
Good for Gujarati food lovers. Hotel required lots of maintenance Economic and family friendliness

No dought Food was awesome . AC Working or not not an issue atleast in winter session but in most of rooms it's not working . Villa provide Wifi but Wifi not working. The swimming pool was not operational due to covid. The rooms are ok ok not specious . Furniture is very old. But the campus is really good. They have plenty of space to sit back relax and enjoy the peace. Support Staff is good. The place is also on a distance of 5 min walking from main market and ST stand. The only thing that the management have to look for is hygiene of the blankets and bedsheets in the room which I feel was lacking. As they were not very clean.

Visiting in June 2022. We paid a reasonable amount of 14k for 6 people including Jain food for all 3 days. The rooms are good, service is also good but the location is awesome. Very close to market, jain derasar & 15 mins to Mapro garden.

Worst place to stay. Aam ras was papaya. Pathetic smelling rooms, cockroaches, and above all the person who we booked with Girish bhai was also very rude. We booked for 3 nights but left  after 1 night. They didn't allow us to have our complimentary breakfast on checkout just because we were leaving as per order of Girishbhai Please don't book this hotel even for free. Best part was on check out even other guest were also leaving. Staff are very very rude and goondah

Neeta Shanti villa Resort at Mahabaleshwar was good & food is very good. But Room Service is not good & satisfactory. S. W. Resort staff behaviour was not good & they talk with rough language including Manager. D J was not working when we asked to start ya on D J staff talk nahi chalu hai nahi hoga manager ne bola hai. Indoor games  was not in good condition & not working. Towels & Drinking water services was not satisfactory & not provide in proper manner. When we asked to manager your services is not good your ratting is down & peoples put in your negative remarks. Manager answered jo review likhna hai likho &  jo karna hai karo. Staff said in rough language.

Detailed Review: TLDR AVAILABLE AT LAST  LOCATION: Located close to Satara Highway, Bus stand and Local shops are close by. Pretty much at the Center of the City. The Hotel was made at a spot of forest, so expect a lot of trees everywhere in premise and good thing they didn't cut trees for making the buildings.  ROOM: The room was good, however you can't open the windows if you are in 10X series of rooms, so no good view also you won't have any privacy if you want to keep the window open since the passage is right front of it.  SERVICE: Room service was average to bad, the Intercom didn't work, asked 4 times to change and yet it wasn't changed. Water bottles worth Rs. 15/- were charged for Rs. 30/- AND THEY DON'T EVEN PROVIDE BILL FOR IT! I asked for bill at least 12-15 times before I left.  MEALS: All meals are available in either Pure Veg and Jain style. The Menu is good for all meals so no need to worry about it.  Overall/TLDR: Pros: 1. Well maintained Greenery and Flower beds 2. Swimming pool with Jacuzzi for kids 3. Good and unlimited food for all the meals 4. Service boy can get your Breakfast / Snacks on request (but there's a con about it)  Cons: 1. Rooms feel suffocating if you are in 10X series of rooms here. 2. Room service is useless if you don't have a working Intercom. Service desk help is pretty much useless. 3. Water bottles are sold at higher price than MRP which is illegal. 15rs. Bottles are sold as high 20 and 30 rs. ASK FOR BILL! if they provide, you can sue them in the court of law. 4. The service staff brings breakfast /snacks to your room but you need to go tell them physically (since you don't have Intercom working).

Location is very near from main market which is only advantage if u want to book shanti villa, staff is not polite no sense of talking to their guest, pool is small becomes too crowded, indoor games play area time is up to 7 pm only, snaks served are limited and no options available, food variety is limited and no proper hygiene is maintained also limited time slot of 1 and half hour  alloted later they close buffet without any adjustments. Overall not value for money u spend and if u are travelling to relax.

Food was awesome as you can see in the attached pictures. AC Working or not not an issue atleast in winter session. The swimming pool was not operational due to covid. The rooms are ok ok. But the campus is really good. They have plenty of space to sit back relax and enjoy the peace.  The place is also on a distance of 5 min walking from main market and ST stand.  The only thing that the management have to look for is hygiene of the blankets and bedsheets in the room which I feel was lacking. As they were not very clean.

Very pathetic property, arrogant & non cooperative staff, underage kids are working in the hotel who does not know anything about hospitality. Zero maintenance, unhygienic toilets, dirty bed sheets. It's simply pathetic.

Swimming pool not cleaned ...they only clean it when more people are there ...me and my kids were the only people in the pool and no one to start the slide and fountain ...after initial  payment they told me that it's a veg place ... So had to cancel the buffet ...Rooms service was good ...intercom phones don't work ...had to call the room service guy via cell phone ...had a lot of expectations after seeing the photos they sent me on WhatsApp ...but most of the things were not working ...like no one to look after the swimming area, no room cleaning and bathroom cleaning , no hot basin water ...bad experience ...

No proper room service,, it's okay type,.. No TV AC working..Food is Good ..Gujarati veg food.. Ambiance also nice but Rooms are Not Deluxe.. Or super delux, site seen commitment not up to mark.. Overall OK...
Rooms are literally yucküòñ bed is not proper bedsheets are not clean lights are not working.

Our check out time was 10:00am we were worried how we are going to manage with all the luggage we had as our Bus booking was for late night around 10:00pm But staff helped us with it they said not to worry and keep out luggage here it was super safe and we could enjoy our day. Staff here is super sweet and helpful I'll rate food 4/5 they also had panipuri for dinner.

Room is not Good, No Smart TV, No Drinking Water in the Room, Gamezone is broken and No any games to play, DJ Night is so bad, Swimming Pool is so small and waiter service is not available, Bed is Good so I giving 1 star to this hotel, AC is not Working. in some room, fan is not available, I don't understand that why this hotel has three star ratings!!!

Villa needs some repairing work due to recent heavy monsoon. Overall quality was not as expected compared to the room fare charged. I hope the villa comes back to it's original good condition because it is a very good property with a swimming pool and kids playing area. It also offers good food.
Food was normal but location it's very good

Rooms are very unclean,sinking, No cooperative staff , not value for money Managers even not ready to solve complains .Never again visit in this hotel, our   Room No 501 to 506 & 516 was our rooms  which is very bad condition. IN Bathroom have insects . Not Recommandable Even bads & matress not good condition  "NAAM BADE DARSHAN KHOTE" food are  so so
We had a great stay at Shanti Villa. The best part is the location & amenities especially when you have a kid with you. Market on walking distance, you can bring outside food.
Because room is clean,nice and helpful staff,and food is awesome üëçüëç

The rooms are very comfortable and big. All the aminities are very nice and staff is also co-operative. The only thing which i think is the area have to be little clean and a swimming pool too. Food is also nice.
IT'S best for families and couples too. You will find all the amenities a good villa resort should at an affordable prices. When in Mahabaleshwar do check it out.

The resort is cottage type. However, my room was really old fashioned, like old sofas and bed and all furniture and washroom. But all was funtioning. Food is good. Outside area is spacious and beautiful. Pool was closed due to Covid protocols. There are play area for kids and two gardens.

Nice Hotel, budget friendly, All meals included, staff is very often operative and meals are delicious. Also it's near to the market hence carries an advantage. Amazing experience. We stayed there for 10 days.
Rooms are average. Renovation is required. Hot water for bath is available from 7.00 till 10:30 morning. Food is just like home.

Worst Experience 1) Super Deluxe Room's are too worst, untidy , not ventilated. 2) AC's are not functioning and fake commitments are given by Manager (Mr.Deepak) 3) All Beds & Pillows were covered with Fungus and unchanged. 4) Soap's Provided in room's were understandard. 5) All staff are priortizing special community people & neglecting Maharashtrian people. 6) Caretaker Mr.Wadkar didn't had courtesy to meet and resolve multiple issues 7) Electricity & Hot Water was also not available.

Please not believe on the positive comments about the hotel. Right from the rooms till the food everything is pathetic here. Rooms are not at all as shown in the website, flush won't work or they  jave Ac's but not even single AC is working.they charge me 3000 for 1 room for 2 adults.Food served is not at all hygiene and you won't at all find it tasty no variety in the menu also you find flies sitting on the food. Total waste of money by choosing this hotel for stay. After arguments they changed our room,in that also AC is not working,and management is saying so what if AC is not working, its a winter time. Then why the fu_k they charged me for AC room .No proper  management,nothing, Will never visit this place again

When you go for a trip outside in a resort you expect it to better than your home at least. This place isn‚Äôt, they‚Äôve tried to accommodate as many rooms as possible and it‚Äôs a bit congested no room has a view because apparently it‚Äôs close to the market. It‚Äôs cost effective i agree but it still is not worth all the travelling if you just want to sit back and relax. You can set your home ac to 18 degrees and you‚Äôd feel the same. The cleanliness is subpar the bathrooms has water dripping from the ceiling, they don‚Äôt provide anything other than a bathing towel and a small green soap. Hot water only in the mornings for 2-3 hours. I got grossed out at least 10 times in just 3-4 hours if stay. The food is good. If you‚Äôre visiting Mahabaleshwar for the first time and will be out most of the time you can go for it. If you‚Äôre here just to chill and will stay in the room for most of your stay. You should look for a better resort
Overall experience was great. People are friendly and helpful. Food is nice, only veg. Rooms were okay,not that clean. Nice villa to spend time with family and friends
It was one of the worst service by shanti villa team. It was night mare.

Very good villa for stay at mahableshwar at a reasonable price. There are the bathtub rooms too, should try one. Libe DJ and swimming pool with rain dance makes it all the more exciting. Give it a try without hesitation.

In one word value for money property for people who wish to explore Mahableshwar and comeback to accommodation without worrying about food quality. Southindian breakfast and Gujarati lunch/dinner is tasty and healthy. There is something for kids too- pool / games corner etc.

Room was good but needs renovation, Pool was also good, Room service also good, Location excellent for 5 ‚≠ê rating Food was 5 ‚≠ê rating super excellent, But site seen guy and his service was third class, don't opt site seen if anyone taking pakage tour with Neeta.

Everybody talking about the cons let me start with the pros, Firstly the food of the hotel is awesome and the genuine management and staff are very helpful .  With respect of rooms : Yes there is a bit hicups here and there and if u r coming into on season then u may have to wait for 3hr for a room but u cantblame the hotel since it gets packed during on season leaving no room untill peole check outon time  Hot water. An area of concern since only 3 hr hot water there .  Food : No Doubts 5 times food u wll get , " A Meal fit for a king" superb .  Staffs : Superb helpful and friendly  Complimentary : Everyday Bed Tea /coffee is complimentary into ur room served very hot.

Food is not good , they serve normally gujrati food only so everything is sweet.. not good option if you are not gujrati food lover. .. they really need maintenance everything is broken, leaked or loose. Very nice property but not maintained .. I found reviews were really good that's why I booked it but hotel doesn't find as per review

Very good budget hotel in Mahabaleshwar. Next to main bus stand. Market is walkable distance 2-3 mins. Taxi and bus stands are next to the hotel. Hospitality, food and facilities are good. Breakfast lunch and dinner is served which is pure veg. Hotel has a pool kids play area, garden. Rooms are very specious unlike other hotels. 2 kigs size beds. You can book whole package from Mumbai Pune at Neeta Travels office. Overall great experience.

Must visit this place. Its is great refreshment Food was awesome it has many variety all was soo yummy.... Rooms were also neat and clean staff is very cooperative. Must visit with family and friends.

The resort is at very good location just in front of Mahabaleshwar ST stand, however the property is not in a good condition. It has space for kids activities like swing, slide etc . Swimming pool was not functional and looked unclean maybe due to Corona. Rooms has TV and AC but was shabby, Bathroom was clean and functional.

Neeta Shantivilla is our first preference in Mahabaleshwar always. Excellent service, delicious food, spacious rooms, superb location, plenty of amenities.... One extra star for service oriented staff & tasty food, we just loved the food! Ideal place for Families for vacation in Mahabaleshwar. I will recommend to go for all meals package, really worth!
Rude staff... Good facilities... Kids friendly... Average rooms... Offer bathtub while booking but don't have actually available
Near to market good location Worst room service Rooms want renovation

Three days back myself with family friends visited....  The worse... The worse...ever in my life visited  such a pathetic ....hotel..... Food quality.... Absolutely not up to the mark.... as compere.to.. What They charge us......  Actually its specious. But whole property. Is very old....needs complete renovation...... Post pandemic its more pathetic.now...  Think twice before booking....
Amazing hospitality and staff, rooms were neat and clean , this is nearby ST and has excellent food , staff , cleanliness. Thank you.. will definitely recommend this for family and friends outing

Please not believe on the positive comments about the hotel. Right from the rooms till the food everything is pathetic here. Rooms are not at all as shown in the webiste, flush won't work or they won't have the AC remote or the lights would not work. Food served is not at all hygiene and you won't at all find it tasty no variety in the menu also you find flies sitting on the food. Total waste of money by choosing this hotel for stay.

We 52 person had stay 2 night in shanti villa, mahabaleshwar. kamleshbhai(Tour organiser )was very cordinative & supportive & humble at his service & booking.we really had lots of fun & made amazing memories in shanti villa. Don‚Äôt believe in negative comment The food was excellent 5 star thank you to the Kamlesh hai

The experience was not very good this time. When I booked my travel, the arrival timing mentioned for Mahabaleshwar was 7am and accordingly I had booked my transport pickup for 7:15. But the bus reached an hour early and I had to wait for over an hour till the booked transport arrived. Please be sure to mention correct timings so that the guests can manage their further plans.

Visiting here after excatly 6 years (including 1 1/2 year of covid). Nice property with 4 times of food they are providing. Breakfast, Lunch, Evening Snacks, Dinner. Masala Milk was also provided during our 1st Stay in Duplex Villa Room No 401 in May 2011. This is our 4th Stay in 10years and in our budget also. 14000 with private car for sightseeing. Nice food option and other services. Super cold during December - January.  Our 4th Stay Date :- 16th - 18th Dec 2021

It is good for weekend trip to mahableshwar food is awesome and hotel is near to market,  only issues is with room ,it is not decent ,team of hotel has to work on this , otherwise very cost effective and awesome place for children also to play
Best for location and Jain food. Relax and chill
Great place to be in Mahabaleshwar, the rooms can do with a little uplift. The team manning the Hotel is very cooperative and the breakfast is minimal yet very good, clean and fulfilling.

It's a very bad  hotel. We booked super deluxe AC room and this is what it looks like(Refer images). From no angle it looks like a super deluxe room. Really unhappy with the room amenities. The hotel needs maintenance. If you look at the images online, those are really good looking and promising. But the reality is something else. There was just 1 charging socket in the entire room. We've requested the room change. Let's what we get.
Superb experience and helpful management.  All members are ready and happy to help us.  Food is awesome and staff make us feel like home.  Must stay here...

He need only money, food quality and room cleaning very bad, room service not available, when you demand towel, soap, water and other not available in a hours, he reminded repeatedly.  This was my experience üò¢

Super deluxe room is too poor ,pool note oped ,game zone also closed , no music nothing to enjoy , special rooms is so cheep, nt Happy I was just spend 2 night 31&1jan'22 , dont not book package its lallu banane ka kam hai ,.  Not happy with shanti villa, neeta travels
Good budget stay Hotel with Gujarati food
Very Nice Place Rooms Were clean and food was nice and staff was polite and service was very good

Nice environment, ambience, Near by market place 5mins walking distance Food was awesome. Room service and the workers, manager senior manager was very co-operative. Rooms r very clean and higinecally maintained

About experience Good Liking fact Good food all three times, good room service, good coordination and about driver he is good person showing all places sharing his knowledge, and avelable as gives time reaching10 min before.
